trans-unit.source: Represents a delegate that is used to filter a list of members represented in an array of <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo> objects.
trans-unit.target: Representerer en representant som brukes til å filtrere en liste over medlemmer som er representert i en matrise av <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo>objekter.</xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo>

trans-unit.source: Every derived class of a <xref:System.Delegate> and <xref:System.MulticastDelegate> has a constructor and an `Invoke` method.
trans-unit.target: Hver utledede klassen av en <xref:System.Delegate>og <xref:System.MulticastDelegate>har en konstruktør og en `Invoke` metode.</xref:System.MulticastDelegate> </xref:System.Delegate>

trans-unit.source: (See the code example in `Delegate`.) The <xref:System.Type.FindMembers%2A> method uses this delegate to filter the list of members that it returns.
trans-unit.target: (Se kodeeksempel i `Delegate`.) Den <xref:System.Type.FindMembers%2A>metoden bruker denne representanten til å filtrere listen over medlemmer som returneres.</xref:System.Type.FindMembers%2A>
